Informação super importante pra quem quer comprar!

Dead by Daylight será dado de graça para os usuários da Epic Games Store na primeira semana de dezembro. Entre os dias 2 e 9 do último mês do ano, quem possuir uma conta na loja poderá resgatar o popular multiplayer assimétrico. Uma vez resgatado, o jogo será seu para sempre.

This Game is a blast to play and watch. I highly recommend it. If you want a good scare play the survivor. If you want to get your kill on play as the killer and prepare for some good ole fun. The killer selection is pretty cool too and the perks that each survivor and killer have bring a fresh take on the genre, but do be fore warned it is a bit of a grind.

Playing survivor with friends is fun, but playing solo (especially killer) is way too stressful to be fun. The community is the most toxic I've ever encountered, and I come from LoL. The devs don't seem to know how to fix their game, so necessary updates take years to occur.

Better off investing your time and money in another game.

Eu simplesmente amo esse jogo, ja comprei ele no xbox, platinei no ps4 e agora estou jogando ele na steam, por mais que sejam os mesmos objetivos por partida, nunca é a mesma partida, cada hora um killer diferente, com sobreviventes diferentes em 1 mapa diferente, fazendo a jogabilidade ser inovada em cada partida, inumeros perks para se montar a sua própria estratégia, é um jogo muito divertido, principalmente com amigos!!
Juego super divertido y mas cuando se juega con amigos
pretty fun to play with or without friends

Задумка хорошая, но воплощение ужасное. Так ну с чего бы начать, во-первых в игре полно багов: пробития сквозь палету(когда ты оглушил мана, а он тебе дал хит или вообще убил). Во-вторых коченые хитбоксы( вспомним топорики у Анны), которые мало того что можно бросить через всю карту, так еще и не обязательно их бросать именно в сурва. Ну и плавненько перейдем к рангам, да-да именно к ним. Ну допустим вы с другом пошли гамать и у вас 10-11 ранги, но ман вам попадается либо с фиолетовым рангом, либо красный, за мана также.Еще чуть-чуть поговорим о рангах, а именно о трудности получения капли. Чтоб получить ее на фиолетовых рангах или красных надо быть и висецом, и беглецом, починить минимум 2-3 гена, спасать тиммейтов. Если вы набрали достаточно очков в каждой категории то может быть вам дадут каплю, но предположим у вас командная игра кто-то чинит, кто-то бегает и знаете что вам дадут в конце катки 0! То есть распределения обязанностей нет. В этой игре еще полным-полно минусов, но думаю пока этого хватит. 



Спустя почти 900 часов проведенных в этой игре, после моего негативного отзыва, я изменил свое отношение к этой игре. Я все ещё вижу проблемы, которые не решают разработчики, баги, но если честно, когда ты наиграл в игру больше 1к часов, тебе уже не так важны эти недочёты. Игра не стоит на месте, как многом кажется. Dead by daylight- это погоня, эмоции и  командная работа.

es un buen juego, pero tiene varios defectos empezando como sobreviviente de rango 13 hacia arriba como resumen es un infierno de camperos no se puede disfrutar de una partida ya que el asesino te seguirá  todo el tiempo y si te llegan a salvar solo ira a por ti pero una vez que pases ese rango se dejan de ver y se puede disfrutar a gusto.
Como asesino donde e dedicado mas horas es entretenido no e pillado defectos a parte de el rusheo de los sobreviviente en rangas 6 hacia abajo pero eso es mas culpa mi por falta de habilidad para evitar que lo logren

Fun but frustrating. Addicting but not competitive. Community is up there with LOL with toxicity, unlocks are very expensive as in days of grind, network bugs are plentiful. And why have a $2000 gaming pc to play a game that looks like it came out on a Xbox 360.

okay so i used to have a review that said how much I disliked this game but i gotta say, i clearly love it to some degree. It can be real garbage when you hit higher ranks and you get dunked on from all angles, but at its core this is a pretty fun game to play with friends. A nice and simple teamwork, working on getting your perks, and just kinda going about playing. Now that it's got more L4D content in it, I've been adding in more hours. It still sucks quite a bit that you're kinda screwed if you're new, but just for a little bit because you have to level up your perks and stuff. The extra characters have better perks, but i guess that makes sense because why would you want DLC that was crappy perks. I have only ever put money into getting the game, everything else has been from grinding up Shards and getting lucky on the perk selections from The Shrine. The battlepass system is alright, i dont care much for the keychains but I do enjoy that i'll be getting some L4D stuff from the current one (writing this in may 2021) and that the killer it focuses on was half-off.
Playing as a survivor can be a chore and honestly if you get used to the idea that most games will be a wash (but you get points anyway) it becomes more tolerable. The game definitely feels killer sided as I'm terrible at this but using the base killers, i can still manage to kill all survivors like one in five games and my rank was 12. Obviously they get super good the more you play cause the rank will go up, but you'll probably find the super good ones at lower levels too either working through their rank or as a result of matchmaking being a lil iffy at times. There's also people who will either team up with lower ranked friends or alts, so thats "fun." Haven't had interactions with hackers in a long time, so hopefully they've got a good grip on that. Being a killer is pretty fun, but that's just as it should be cause you need to incentivise people playing alone and the fact you're going against 4 other players. Not saying it's super hard for survivors to beat the killer, but it's never an easy task (unless you're outskilled) so its pretty neat.

I'm very tempted to get the Silent Hill DLC and overall I'd say it's a good game. Definitely got my money's worth out of it and the devs are very active on adding in new stuff. I prefer being a killer but more of my time is spent as a survivor
